With the penalty, Ronaldo moved one goal behind former Los Blancos marksman Hugo Sanchez; nine clear of third-placed Ronald Kouman.
The Portuguese attacker has scored three penalties this season and has made it his goal to break the record set by Sanchez.
After the Sporting penalty, Ronaldo will surely be looking to equal the Mexican's record at the Camp Nou in next weekend's Clasico.
Most penalties scored in La Liga:
1. Hugo Sanchez - 56
2. Cristiano Ronaldo - 55
3. Ronald Kouman - 46
4. Luboslav Penev - 43
5. Lionel Messi - 42
6. Dani Ruiz-Bazan - 34
7. Maranon - 34
8. David Villa - 32
9. Ander Garitano - 31
10. Quini - 30
11. Raul Tamudo - 30
